author: SciShow
description:
To try Brilliant for free, visit brilliant.org/scishow or scan the QR code onscreen—or you can click on the link in the description. You’ll also get 20% off an annual premium subscription.

How would you deal with sewage waste pollution? Here in Missoula, the answer was.... poplar trees. Here's the weird reason that these poplar trees are some of nature's best cleaners, and why our hometown heroes might not be so awesome for forever.

Hosted by: Hank Green (he/him)

title: Why Some Trees in SciShow's Hometown Are Full of Poop
